data.name: Crossbones
data.description: A vengeful, die hard bruiser with a devastating explosion attack.

starItems.name: Crossbones
starItems.description: A vengeful, die hard bruiser with a devastating explosion attack.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance of a Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>65%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage on primary attack
Bonus Attack applies <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>115%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance of a Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>65%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage on primary attack
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on Bonus attack

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance of a Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>95%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage on primary attack
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to Bonus attack

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance of a Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>95%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage on primary attack
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on Bonus attack

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance of a Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> damage on primary attack
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to Bonus attack

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>175%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance of a Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance of a Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

3.nextUpgrade:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health
If Baron Zemo is an ally, Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health instead

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.
If Baron Zemo is an ally, Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health instead.

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.
If Baron Zemo is an ally, Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health instead.

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.
If Baron Zemo is an ally, Heal self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of Max Health instead.

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color>. Heal self for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health.
If Baron Zemo is an ally, Heal self for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of Max Health instead.

1.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, then explode for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage to self and all enemies.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> as well.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to self and all enemies

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, then explode for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage to self and all enemies.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> as well.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to self and all enemies

3.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, then explode for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage to self and all enemies.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> as well.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to self and all enemies

4.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, then explode for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage to self and all enemies.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> as well.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to self and all enemies

5.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, then explode for <color=#86e619>440%</color> damage to self and all enemies.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> as well.

6.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, then explode for <color=#86e619>440%</color> damage to self and all enemies.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> as well.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to self and all enemies

7.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, then explode for <color=#86e619>480%</color> damage to self and all enemies.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> as well.

1.description:
On Spawn, if Baron Zemo is an ally, generate Ability Energy for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health
If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

2.description:
On Spawn, if Baron Zemo is an ally, generate Ability Energy for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health. If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor.

3.description:
On Spawn, if Baron Zemo is an ally, generate Ability Energy for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health. If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> additional Max Health if Baron Zemo is an ally

4.description:
On Spawn, if Baron Zemo is an ally, generate Ability Energy for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor.

5.description:
On Spawn, if Baron Zemo is an ally, generate Ability Energy for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. If Baron Zemo is an ally, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Armor.
